name: @zoho/SecurityJS
description: SecurityJS is a client-side security library, built and used by Zoho.
author: Patrick P <patrick.p@zohocorp.com> Vigneshwar M <vigneshwar.mk@zohocorp.com>

scripts.installer1: cd test/customKarmaReporter/ && npm link && cd ../../ && npm link karma-custom-json-reporter && npm run build
scripts.installer2: rollup ./node_modules/karma-iframes/static/iframes-adapter.js -c rollup.config.js -f es -o ./node_modules/karma-iframes/static/iframes-adapter.js && rollup ./node_modules/karma-iframes/static/reverse-context.js -c rollup.config.js -f es -o ./node_modules/karma-iframes/static/reverse-context.js
scripts.build:all: cross-env run-p build:es build:cjs build:umd build:umd:min
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=rollup FORMAT=es rollup -c rollup.es-config.js -f es
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=rollup FORMAT=cjs rollup -c rollup.es-config.js -f cjs
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=rollup rollup -c rollup.umd-config.js -f umd
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=rollup rollup -c rollup.umd-config.js -f umd
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=rollup karma start test/config/custom.karma.conf.js --reporters dots,custom
scripts.testlocal: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=rollup karma start test/config/custom.karma.conf.js --reporters dots,custom --browsers Chrome
scripts.test:unmin: cross-env NODE_ENV=test BABEL_ENV=rollup karma start test/config/custom.karma.conf.js --reporters verbose
scripts.test:all: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=rollup karma start test/config/custom.karma.conf.js --reporters dots --shouldTestAllBrowsers
scripts.test:all:unmin: cross-env NODE_ENV=test BABEL_ENV=rollup karma start test/config/custom.karma.conf.js --reporters verbose --shouldTestAllBrowsers
scripts.testing: cross-env NODE_ENV=test BABEL_ENV=rollup karma start test/config/custom.karma.conf.js --reporters dots,custom
